name: The Last Clockwinder
summary:
Winner of Meta Quest's Best Game of 2022!

“One of the most unique and creative VR games ever” - Polygon

“The BEST puzzle game since PORTAL” - Beardo Benjo

On a distant planet, the Clocktower is about to be lost forever. Can you stop it from sinking?

{"height":514,"type":"video","width":1280}

Your mission is to repair an ancient haven for the galaxy’s plants and seeds. Use the Clockwinder’s gloves to create clockwork contraptions from your own clones.

Command and coordinate your automatons to...
